meanings.sent1: She gently touched her nombril to feel the warmth.
meanings.sent2: The baby's nombril was still healing after birth.
meanings.sent3: The nombril peeked out from under her shirt, making her giggle.
meanings.sent4: His nombril seemed like the center of his universe, holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The nombril, a tiny scar, marked the spot where he was once connected to his mother.

meanings.sent1: The nombril of the discussion was the upcoming project deadline.
meanings.sent2: The nombril of the compass pointed north.
meanings.sent3: The nombril of attention shifted from one topic to another in the meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her nombril in the room was the beautiful painting hanging on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The nombril of the city, the bustling market square, was always full of life.
